titleStmt.title: The orthodox foundation of religion long since collected by that iudicious and elegant man, Mr. Henry Ainsworth, for the benefit of his private company, and now divulged for the publike good of all that desire to know that Cornerstone, Christ Jesus crucified / by S.W.
titleStmt.author: Ainsworth, Henry, 1571-1622?
S. W. (Samuel White)

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by R.C. for M. Sparke, Junior ...,

notesStmt.note: Later published with title: The old orthodox foundation of religion.
Reproduction of original in Thomason Collection, British Library.
